meaningMnemonic: If you want to <radical>go</radical> to <radical>Korea</radical> you'll need a good <kanji>defense</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: You need a good <kanji>defense</kanji> to go to Korea, so you fill your pockets with <reading>a</reading>corns (えい). When you get to Korea you plant them all around yourself. In no time you'll have a strong tree defense, keeping you safe.
